name: Zaryab

projects.title: wildfire tracker
projects.description: NASA API and google maps based app that tracks recent natural catastrophies and plants the location on google maps

projects.title: News scrapper
projects.description: a node js api that scraps news from recent news articles

projects.title: image classifier
projects.description: A python based image classifier with gui trained on cifer10 dataset that classies image in one of 10 classes(traning code included)

projects.title: Genre Detection
projects.description: A trained and tested RNN model that classifies music into its respective categories(ipynb file included)

projects.title: Recommendation system
projects.description: a module of my final project that does history based recommendations for users(ipynb file included)

services.title: Web Design
services.description: We build and optimize your online presence.  Website is the digital entry point into your business and a powerful revenue channel.

services.title: 3D Design
services.description: We combine creative design and technical skills to build striking 3D visualisations that bring your project to life.

aboutpara: Currently working as a software engineer. I am passionate about MERN stack development and new technologies emerging in web development.

resume.tagline: ðŸ‘‹  I'm a software engineer, product designer, and maker.
resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to millions of people. Well-versed with React, Javascript, and most of the Web frameworks.

bullets: During my tenure at Alachisoft, while undergoing intensive training on NCache, I also actively engaged in various quality assurance activities. This included manual testing across diverse functionalities, and identifying issues within documentation to enhance its accuracy. Additionally, I extensively tested and scrutinized the locking mechanisms, as well as evaluated the performance of asynchronous and bulk operations within NCache

Developed the user interface for an online shoe store using React.js, enhancing user experience with dynamic animations via Framer Motion. Integrated a wide range of icons efficiently using Iconify, contributing to a visually appealing and user-friendly design

education.universityPara: completed my bachelor in computer science from comsats Islamabad in 2024
